verses.text: \w An|strong="G5613"\w* ancient \w man|strong="G3361"\w* \w rebuke|strong="G1969"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w entreat|strong="G3870"\w* \w him|strong="G3870"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w a|strong="G5613"\w* \w father|strong="G3962"\w*: \w young|strong="G3501"\w* \w men|strong="G4245"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*:

Honour \w widows|strong="G5503"\w*, that \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w widows|strong="G5503"\w* \w indeed|strong="G3689"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* \w widow|strong="G5503"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w children|strong="G5043"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w grandchildren|strong="G1549"\w*, \w let|strong="G1510"\w* \w her|strong="G2192"\w* \w learn|strong="G3129"\w* \w first|strong="G4412"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* govern \w her|strong="G2192"\w* \w own|strong="G2398"\w* \w house|strong="G3624"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w make|strong="G0591"\w* \w a|strong="G2192"\w* \w return|strong="G0591"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* duty \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w her|strong="G2192"\w* \w parents|strong="G4269"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w acceptable|strong="G0587"\w* \w before|strong="G1799"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* she \w that|strong="G2250"\w* \w is|strong="G2316"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w widow|strong="G5503"\w* \w indeed|strong="G2532"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* desolate, let \w her|strong="G1679"\w* \w trust|strong="G1679"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w continue|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* supplications \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w prayers|strong="G4335"\w* \w night|strong="G3571"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w*.

\w For|strong="G2198"\w* she \w that|strong="G1161"\w* liveth \w in|strong="G1161"\w* pleasures, \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w dead|strong="G2348"\w* \w while|strong="G1161"\w* she \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w living|strong="G2198"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w give|strong="G3853"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w charge|strong="G3853"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w may|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* blameless.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w have|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* care \w of|strong="G5100"\w* \w his|strong="G2532"\w* \w own|strong="G2398"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w especially|strong="G3122"\w* \w of|strong="G5100"\w* \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w of|strong="G5100"\w* \w his|strong="G2532"\w* house, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* hath \w denied|strong="G0720"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w worse|strong="G5501"\w* \w than|strong="G2532"\w* \w an|strong="G1510"\w* infidel.

\w Let|strong="G1096"\w* \w a|strong="G1096"\w* \w widow|strong="G5503"\w* \w be|strong="G1096"\w* chosen \w of|strong="G0435"\w* \w no|strong="G3361"\w* \w less|strong="G1640"\w* \w than|strong="G3361"\w* threescore \w years|strong="G2094"\w* \w of|strong="G0435"\w* \w age|strong="G2094"\w*, \w who|strong="G0435"\w* hath \w been|strong="G1096"\w* \w the|strong="G1096"\w* \w wife|strong="G1135"\w* \w of|strong="G0435"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w husband|strong="G0435"\w*.

\w Having|strong="G3140"\w* \w testimony|strong="G3140"\w* \w for|strong="G1722"\w* \w her|strong="G3956"\w* \w good|strong="G0018"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w*, \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w she|strong="G1487"\w* \w have|strong="G3956"\w* \w brought|strong="G5044"\w* \w up|strong="G5044"\w* \w children|strong="G5044"\w*, \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w she|strong="G1487"\w* \w have|strong="G3956"\w* \w received|strong="G3140"\w* \w to|strong="G1722"\w* harbour, \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w she|strong="G1487"\w* \w have|strong="G3956"\w* \w washed|strong="G3538"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w saints’|strong="G0040"\w* \w feet|strong="G4228"\w*, \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w she|strong="G1487"\w* \w have|strong="G3956"\w* ministered \w to|strong="G1722"\w* \w them|strong="G1722"\w* \w that|strong="G3956"\w* \w suffer|strong="G2346"\w* tribulation, \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w she|strong="G1487"\w* \w have|strong="G3956"\w* diligently \w followed|strong="G1872"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w good|strong="G0018"\w* \w work|strong="G2041"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w younger|strong="G3501"\w* \w widows|strong="G5503"\w* avoid. \w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w when|strong="G3752"\w* \w they|strong="G3752"\w* \w have|strong="G5547"\w* grown wanton \w in|strong="G1161"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w they|strong="G3752"\w* \w will|strong="G2309"\w* \w marry|strong="G1060"\w*:

\w Having|strong="G2192"\w* damnation, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* \w they|strong="G3754"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* made void \w their|strong="G2192"\w* \w first|strong="G4413"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* withal being \w idle|strong="G0692"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w learn|strong="G3129"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w go|strong="G4022"\w* \w about|strong="G3588"\w* \w from|strong="G2980"\w* \w house|strong="G3614"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w house|strong="G3614"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w only|strong="G3440"\w* \w idle|strong="G0692"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* tattlers \w also|strong="G2532"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w busybodies|strong="G4021"\w*, \w speaking|strong="G2980"\w* \w things|strong="G2980"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w ought|strong="G1163"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*.

\w I|strong="G3767"\w* \w will|strong="G1325"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w that|strong="G3767"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w younger|strong="G3501"\w* \w should|strong="G3367"\w* \w marry|strong="G1060"\w*, \w bear|strong="G5041"\w* \w children|strong="G5041"\w*, \w be|strong="G3767"\w* mistresses \w of|strong="G3588"\w* families, \w give|strong="G1325"\w* \w no|strong="G3367"\w* \w occasion|strong="G0874"\w* \w to|strong="G1014"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* adversary \w to|strong="G1014"\w* speak evil.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w already|strong="G2235"\w* \w turned|strong="G1624"\w* \w aside|strong="G1624"\w* \w after|strong="G3694"\w* \w Satan|strong="G4567"\w*.

\w If|strong="G1487"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* \w of|strong="G1577"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w faithful|strong="G4103"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w widows|strong="G5503"\w*, \w let|strong="G2443"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* minister \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w let|strong="G2443"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w church|strong="G1577"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* charged: \w that|strong="G2443"\w* there \w may|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* sufficient \w for|strong="G2443"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w widows|strong="G5503"\w* \w indeed|strong="G2532"\w*.

Let \w the|strong="G3588"\w* priests \w that|strong="G1722"\w* rule \w well|strong="G2573"\w*, \w be|strong="G2532"\w* esteemed \w worthy|strong="G0515"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w double|strong="G1362"\w* honour: \w especially|strong="G3122"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* labour \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w word|strong="G3056"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w doctrine|strong="G1319"\w*:

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w scripture|strong="G1124"\w* saith: Thou shalt \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w muzzle|strong="G5392"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w ox|strong="G1016"\w* \w that|strong="G3004"\w* treadeth out \w the|strong="G3588"\w* corn: \w and|strong="G2532"\w*, \w The|strong="G3588"\w* labourer \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w worthy|strong="G0514"\w* \w of|strong="G3004"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w reward|strong="G3408"\w*.

\w Against|strong="G2596"\w* \w a|strong="G2228"\w* priest \w receive|strong="G3858"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w an|strong="G2228"\w* \w accusation|strong="G2724"\w*, \w but|strong="G1487"\w* \w under|strong="G1909"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w three|strong="G5140"\w* \w witnesses|strong="G3144"\w*.

\w Them|strong="G1651"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w sin|strong="G0264"\w* \w reprove|strong="G1651"\w* \w before|strong="G1799"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*: \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w rest|strong="G3062"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w may|strong="G2532"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w fear|strong="G5401"\w*.

\w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w charge|strong="G1263"\w* thee \w before|strong="G1799"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w elect|strong="G1588"\w* \w angels|strong="G0032"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* thou \w observe|strong="G4160"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w* \w without|strong="G5565"\w* \w prejudice|strong="G4299"\w*, \w doing|strong="G4160"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3367"\w* \w by|strong="G2596"\w* declining \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w either|strong="G2532"\w* side.

Impose \w not|strong="G3367"\w* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w* lightly \w upon|strong="G5495"\w* \w any|strong="G3367"\w* \w man|strong="G3367"\w*, \w neither|strong="G3366"\w* \w be|strong="G3366"\w* partaker \w of|strong="G5495"\w* \w other|strong="G0245"\w* \w men’s|strong="G0245"\w* \w sins|strong="G0266"\w*. \w Keep|strong="G5083"\w* thyself \w chaste|strong="G0053"\w*.

\w Do|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3371"\w* still \w drink|strong="G5202"\w* \w water|strong="G5202"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w use|strong="G5530"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w little|strong="G3641"\w* \w wine|strong="G3631"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* thy stomach’s \w sake|strong="G1223"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* thy \w frequent|strong="G4437"\w* \w infirmities|strong="G0769"\w*.

\w Some|strong="G5100"\w* \w men’s|strong="G0444"\w* \w sins|strong="G0266"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* manifest, \w going|strong="G4254"\w* \w before|strong="G4254"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w judgment|strong="G2920"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w follow|strong="G1872"\w* \w after|strong="G1161"\w*.

\w In|strong="G2532"\w* like \w manner|strong="G2570"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w good|strong="G2570"\w* \w deeds|strong="G2041"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* manifest: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G2192"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w otherwise|strong="G0247"\w*, \w cannot|strong="G3756"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w hid|strong="G2928"\w*.
